name: Overrun (Moepeldimoep, PitBuII)
description:
You are a dice on a living board game.

Game Rules:

You complete a level by reaching the passage on the top right of the board game.

If a game figure succeeds to jump on your spot you lose the game.

A new number is rolled every time you (the dice) stops moving. That number determines the amount of steps the game figures are allowed to take.  The number stands on top of the player.

Movement:

You can move with WADS. 

You don’t have to stop moving after one field. As long as there is nothing in the way, you can proceed moving in one direction.

You have to stay on your field while other figures move. (Except when the horse comes to close)

Game Figures:

Only one figure from every type is active at once and during a round only one is moving.

Depending on the type, the game figures show different characteristics.

The red horse is the aggressive one and tries to defeat you directly.

The green domino is the intelligent one and tries to block your path.

The yellow game figure wants to impress you and tries to stay in front of you.

Level:

After the 7th level the board game will be auto- generated and become harder.
